array.name: answers
array.item: There are no restrictions on travel within the Siberian Federal District. Intersection The Siberian Federal District, as well as the borders of the Russian Federation, is agreed with the manager.

The car is provided in a clean condition, with a full tank of fuel and completely ready for travel at the point of issue or delivered to the desired location. Returned in the same form and with the same amount of fuel in a place convenient for you, but according to preliminary agreements.

You can pay for the reserved car using a credit card or cash or bank transfer, payment is made for the entire period of car rental. If the car returns earlier than the specified period, we will recalculate, and only time of use.

If you need a car delivery in the city, then you pay for it separately at following tariffs: 500 – night time from the office (from 20:00 to 9:00) 1000 – daytime, anywhere in the city (from 9:00 to 20:00) 2000 – night time, anywhere in the city (from 20:00 to 9:00)
When renting for 7 days or more, delivery is free!

There is a daily mileage limit of 200 km, which is included in the rental price. You You can exceed this limit, in which case overmileage is calculated at the rate of 5 rubles/km (economy), 10 rubles/km (comfort and premium).
Yes, we can provide you with a child seat and other additional equipment - for free. Before renting, you must first clarify which equipment you will need. required.

Yes, a deposit is required. The deposit is a guarantee of the tenant\'s performance of the contract. The security deposit is not part of the rental price and is paid separately. Collateral is a fixed amount of money - auto section \"Economy\" - 5,000 rubles, auto sections \"Comfort\" and \"Premium\" - 10,000 rubles. Personal belongings, passport, and other documents are not collateral. We return the deposit to you at the time of handing over the car and signing the certificate. reception/transmission, so you don’t have to wait.

No, if the car is provided in a clean condition. Yes, washing is paid separately - 1,000 rubles.
In what case does the client pay for the car wash: 1. The car is dirty outside and inside; 2. The car is clean on the outside, but dirty on the inside (rugs, crumbs, stains); 3. The car is clean inside, but dirty outside (sills, wheels, individual parts car); 4. The car is covered in sand or dust.
Weather conditions are not a condition for non-fulfillment of contractual obligations regarding car washes.
If at the time of booking the car is in a dirty condition, we offer you choose what type of car to rent in order to save your money on washing
Emergency car delivery (30 – 90 minutes) does not guarantee a clean car delivery form, because It takes at least 2 hours to wash a car. Therefore, we recommend booking car in advance.
Age of 22 years, driver\'s license category B with at least 2 years of experience and general civil passport of the Russian Federation.

You refuel the car yourself, only with AI-95 gasoline. The car is delivered with the amount of fuel remaining after previous use. Accordingly, the car must be returned at the same level. If there is fuel in the tank less than it was when the car was handed over to you, then payment is made at the rate of 50 rubles - one liter. A car with a full tank is provided exclusively upon the client\'s request.
Yes, a complete package of documents with all receipts.

Cars are insured by the MTPL policy.
If the accident occurred through no fault of yours, and all certificates from the scene of the accident are provided - the amount responsibility is zero.
If the accident occurred due to the fault of the client, then responsibility for compensation lies with per client. If it is impossible to prove the guilt of a third party, liability also falls on the client.
No, the cars are not branded.

Fines for traffic violations are paid by the client. Once the fine is received by us, manager we will send you information about him. You only need to transfer the fine amount via landlord\'s details.
Fine for smoking in the cabin – 5000 Fine for late payment for car renewal – 1000 rubles/day Fine for loss of documents – 10,000 rubles/unit Fine for loss of key/alarm – 10,000 rubles/unit
Yes, if it meets the requirements of the Vodimobil rental terms. Agreement for the second driver - 300 rubles.

In case of an accident or any damage to the car, call us and report happened: we will tell you how to act in this situation. If an accident occurs not through your fault, and all certificates from the scene of the accident are provided - the amount of liability is equal to zero.
Contact support by phone or write to us on social media. networks and us We\`ll tell you how to act and what to do in such a situation.
Unfortunately, this option is not available when renting.
Write or call us, we will do our best to return your items.
